snippet: The governor is raising the minimum wage to $10.15 for state government employees and workers on jobs contracted by the state.
abstract: Pennsylvania Gov Tom Wolf signs executive order raising minimum wage to $10.15 for state government employees and workers on jobs contracted by state.
lead_paragraph: The governor is raising the minimum wage to $10.15 for state government employees and workers on jobs contracted by the state.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Minimum Wage Boosted for Some
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Minimum Wage Is Increased for Some
